mapper.select: SELECT A.EMPLYR_ID, A.USER_NM, (CASE WHEN B.USER_ABSNCE_AT IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE B.USER_ABSNCE_AT END) AS USER_ABSNCE_AT, (CASE WHEN B.USER_ABSNCE_AT IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS REG_YN, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, to_char(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM LETTNEMPLYRINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNUSERABSNCE B ON A.EMPLYR_ID = B.EMPLYR_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.EMPLYR_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTNUSERABSNCE ( EMPLYR_ID, USER_ABSNCE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userAbsnceAt}, #{lastUpdusrId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lastUpdusrId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE LETTNUSERABSNCE SET USER_ABSNCE_AT = #{userAbsnceAt}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #{userId}
